name: OG VF Barber Danny Meadows Medical Fundraiser

metadata.name: The Chess Board of Life
metadata.description:
This limited edition NFT was created by members of the VeeFriends community to help fellow member Danny Meadows with his medical costs and keeping his barbershop afloat while he recovers from surgery. 

Danny suffered a life-threatening motorcycle accident in 2020. He was lucky to live and almost had his leg amputated. Complications with his recovery have led to yet another surgery and his expected recovery time is now 3 months. Shutting down your business for one day can have incredible repercussions, let alone 3 months.

There is strength in numbers and if we, the Veefriends community, rise together and claim as many editions of this NFT as possible, this will not only improve his financial situation, but also lift his spirit while he recovers!

If you cannot claim at this time, please like, comment and retweet the announcement tweet so we can bring awareness to others.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Love, the Veefriends Community

P.S. the artwork was created by Dav (@dav_iot) using Midjourney AI, Motionleap & Photoleap; the Manifold contract was created and deployed by Jancarlo (@Jancarlo316)
